column4: i have an external hard drive with 53 gigs of space and it won't let me move 5 gigs to it.  Earror reads the disk won't write the disk is full - how do I fix my disk space?
is it 1 5G file, or multiple files?
well I'm sorry to say you're out of luck, you can't have a file larger than 4G on a fat32 drive
